title: Every champion is free?
body: If you open the League of Legends client, at the free champion rotation part, it shows that every single champion is free.

replies.body: Yeah, this looks like a goof, oops!  The current[ free champion rotation ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation)only has a limited few.  Hope that helps!
